name: @greenroom-robotics/launchpad
description: Unified launcher for Greenroom Robotics desktop applications

scripts.compile: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs
scripts.init: npm run create-renderer && npm run integrate-renderer && npm install
scripts.generate-icons: inkscape buildResources/icon.svg --export-type=png --export-filename=buildResources/icon-1024.png --export-width=1024 --export-height=1024 --export-background-opacity=0 && npx electron-icon-builder --input=buildResources/icon-1024.png --output=buildResources --flatten && mv buildResources/icons/* buildResources/ && rmdir buildResources/icons
